pd.ph: 0: The automatic mode. The SDK has this mode enabled by default. In this mode, the SDK attempts a direct connection to SD-RTNâ„¢ and automatically switches to TCP/TLS 443 if the attempt fails.

plentry.pd: 1: The cloud proxy for the UDP protocol, that is, the Force UDP cloud proxy mode. In this mode, the SDK always transmits data over UDP.
2: The cloud proxy for the TCP (encryption) protocol, that is, the Force TCP cloud proxy mode. In this mode, the SDK always transmits data over TCP/TLS 443.
